data.name: iwa-miRNA
data.description: iwa-miRNA is a web-based platform for interactive annotation of plant miRNAs

evidence: "iwa-miRNA allows users to generate a comprehensive collection of miRNA candidates, and to interrogate miRNA annotation in a straightforward way, without the need for computational skills."

"iwa-miRNA Docker image is available at https://hub.docker.com/r/malab/iwa-mirna. Source codes and user manual are available at https://github.com/cma2015/iwa-miRNA. The web server of iwa-miRNA is accessible at http://iwa-miRNA.omicstudio.cloud/."
"The iwa-miRNA is composed with three functional modules: MiRNA Compilation, MiRNA Selection, and Manual Curation. It also provides users with some useful tools for downstream exploratory analysis."
